appDesc.message: This extension is looking for the right product for the selected text on popular trading platforms: Aliexpress, eBay, Amazon...

onGoogle.message: Searches for the selected text used Google search-engine

onSite.message: Searches for the selected text directly into these sites

onYandex.message: Searches for the selected text used Yandex search-engine

selectors.message: Left click select checkbox, rigth click or scroll change site for search
